name: Harma
storyline:
Harma began with the belief of humans overcoming hardships.
We have created an immensely challenging strategic card game that befits this theme.
Drawing inspiration from numerous classics, this game enhances the elements of strategic card games
while reimagining a tragic narrative through a retro dark fantasy lens.

The dark fantasy world is the emblem of this game.
Engage in battles with a diverse and unique array of demons depicted in
8-color retro pixel art, providing exceptional immersion.
Venture through this gloomy world amidst wandering destinies.

The challenging difficulty and profound strategic elements are another symbol of this game.
Our lives are never simply fulfilled as we wish.
Choices based on strategy and random factors demonstrate that the fight against demons is no easy task.
However, we have always embraced challenges that are worth it.
Stand against the world's evil and prove your existence.
summary: Harma began with the belief of humans overcoming hardships. We have created an immensely challenging strategic card game that befits this theme. If you are someone who doesn't shy away from life's trials and faces them head-on, this game is for you.
